name: Let there be chaos (Luscsus)
description:
You're the president of the country, your task is to cause as much chaos as possible by making the correct decisions. The game offers several endings. Try to achieve all of them. 

Making the game:

This game jam I didn't have a lot of time, and that is why I chose to make a game with a small scope. There are plenty of ways I could improve the game such as a way to see what endings you have completed, bug fixes... But I don't have the time nor will to add those features. Hope you enjoy my submission for the Brackeys game jam.

Credits: 

Button sound effect:  https://freesound.org/,

Font: https://www.dafont.com/rainyhearts.font,

Everything else: me.
